divs: Sighting Detailsnot much i spotted it coming home from daytrip. sky was clear just getting dark it was obvious in the sky--- it was gone in 5 min maybe tree obstuction because it wasnt directly over head never seen anything like that before---first though a plane on fire but it kept moving slowly to the south allthough i was in the eastern sky
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Port Dover
There were no other sightings in Port Dover on or around July 10th 2013
Summary: noticed a round orange glowing object thought maybe it was a plane on fire
